changeSet.author: astrauss (generated)
changeSet.sql:
ALTER proc [dbo].[sp_create_review] (@selection_id uniqueidentifier, @login_credential char(6)) as
declare @review_id uniqueidentifier, @review_lvl_id uniqueidentifier, @prsnnl_id uniqueidentifier
--alter table review NOCHECK CONSTRAINT GUID_reivew_ID
--select @selection_id = convert(uniqueidentifier, @in_selection_id)
select @review_id = newid()
select @prsnnl_id = prsnnl_id from personnel where login_credential = @login_credential and status_code = 'A'
insert into review (review_id , batch_id , case_number , selection_id , created_ts , orig_rvwr_prsnnl_id, review_scope, ORIG_ASSIGN_DT, STATUS ) select @review_id , batch_id , case_number , @selection_id , getdate() , @prsnnl_id, 'Full', getdate(), 'Under Review' from loan_selection where convert(char(36), selection_id) = @selection_id
--alter table review with check check CONSTRAINT GUID_reivew_ID
--alter table review_level NOCHECK CONSTRAINT GUID_REVIEW_LVL_ID
select @review_lvl_id = newid()
insert into review_level (review_lvl_id, review_id, rvw_location_id, created_ts, orig_rvwr_prsnnl_id, rvwr_prsnnl_id, status, REVIEW_LEVEL_ID) select @review_lvl_id , @review_id , rvw_location_id, getdate(), @prsnnl_id, @prsnnl_id, 'Assigned', '6EE39634-90A4-4DE2-8C7A-C5A6B3114B08' from loan_selection where selection_id = @selection_id
--alter table review_level with check check CONSTRAINT GUID_REVIEW_LVL_ID
insert into rvw_lvl_case_summary (--review_id , review_lvl_id, assumed_loan_ind , cashout_refi_ind , --declining_mkt_ind , disaster_ind , gift_ltr_amt , gift_ltr_2_amt , gift_ltr_src , --gift_ltr_2_source , invest_2nd_resid_ind , num_living_units , loan_prps , ratio_loan_to_vl_new , loan_type , fctry_fbrct , --market_condition_rpt , --max_claim_amt , --mixed_use_prop_ind , current_at_endorse_ind , --non_pub_util_common_ind , --paystubs_cover_30_days_ind , PRODUCT_TYPE_ID , --prop_curr_occupancy_type , pd_strmln_flg , --property_repairs , --pub_well_septic_avail_area_ind , --pub_well_septic_avail_site_ind , --ratio_tot_pmt_to_tot_inc , rfnc_cd , --repair_escrow_acct_estab , --sls_prc_gt_acq_cost , soa_cd , --underwriting_method , --util_on_at_inspection , --created_by , --updated_by , created_ts , bldg_typ ) select --@review_id , @review_lvl_id , 'N', cashout_refi_ind , --'N' , 'N' , gift_ltr_amt , gift_ltr_2_amt , gift_ltr_src , --gift_ltr_2_source , 'N' , 1 , loan_prps , ratio_loan_to_vl_new , loan_type , fctry_fbrct , --market_condition_rpt , --max_claim_amt , --'N' , 'N' , --'N' , --'N' , PRODUCT_TYPE_ID , --prop_curr_occupancy_type , pd_strmln_flg , --property_repairs , --'N' , --'N' , --ratio_tot_pmt_to_tot_inc , rfnc_cd , --repair_escrow_acct_estab , --sls_prc_gt_acq_cost , soa_cd , --underwriting_method , --util_on_at_inspection , --created_by , --updated_by , getdate() , bldg_typ from loan_selection_case_summary where selection_id = @selection_id
insert into REVIEW_QATREE (REVIEW_ID, QATREE_ID, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY, CREATED_TS, UPDATED_TS) select @review_id, QATREE_ID, 'H00001', 'H00001', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP from LOAN_SELECTION ls, qatree Q1, REVIEW_TYPE_DEFECT rtd where ls.REVIEW_TYPE_ID = rtd.REVIEW_TYPE_ID and rtd.DEFECT_CD = Q1.DEFECT_CD and Q1.QATREE_VERSION_ID = (select max(QATREE_VERSION_ID) from QATREE Q2 where Q1.DEFECT_CD = Q2.DEFECT_CD) and ls.SELECTION_ID = @selection_id
